words.translation: Alif Lam Mim

translations.1: Alif-Laaam-Meeem
translations.2: Alifl<u>a</u>mmeem

words.translation: Have been defeated|the Romans

translations.1: Ghulibatir Room
translations.2: Ghulibati alrroomu

words.translation: In|(the) nearest|land|But they|after|after|their defeat|will overcome

translations.1: Feee adnal ardi Wa-hum mim ba'di ghalabihim sa-yaghliboon
translations.2: Fee adna alardi wahum min baAAdi ghalabihim sayaghliboona

words.translation: Within|a few|years|For Allah|(is) the command|before|before|and after|and after|And that day|will rejoice|the believers

translations.1: Fee bid'i sineen; lillaahil amru min qablu Wa-mim ba'd; Wa-yawma'izien yafrahul mu'minoon
translations.2: Fee bidAAi sineena lillahi alamru min qablu wamin baAAdu wayawmaithin yafrahu almuminoona

words.translation: With (the) help|(of) Allah|He helps|whom|He wills|And He|(is) the All-Mighty|the Most Merciful

translations.1: Binasril laa; yansuru maien yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
translations.2: Binasri Allahi yansuru man yashao wahuwa alAAazeezu alrraheemu

words.translation: (It is the) Promise|(of) Allah|(Does) not|fail|Allah|(in) His promise|but|most (of)|[the] people|(do) not|know

translations.1: Wa'dal laahi laa yukhliful laahu wa'dahoo Wa-laakin-na aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
translations.2: WaAAda Allahi la yukhlifu Allahu waAAdahu walakinna akthara alnnasi la yaAAlamoona

words.translation: They know|(the) apparent|of|the life|(of) the world|but they|about|the Hereafter|[they]|(are) heedless

translations.1: Ya'lamoona zaahiram minal hayaatid dunya Wa-hum 'anil Aakhirati hum ghaafiloon
translations.2: YaAAlamoona thahiran mina alhayati alddunya wahum AAani alakhirati hum ghafiloona

words.translation: Do not|they ponder|within|themselves|Not|Allah (has) created|Allah (has) created|the heavens|and the earth|and what|(is) between them|except|in truth|and (for) a term|appointed|And indeed|many|of|the people|in (the) meeting|(with) their Lord|surely (are) disbelievers

translations.1: Awalam yatafakkaroo feee anfusihim; maa khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaaa illaa bil-haqqi Wa-ajalim musammaa; Wa-inna kaseeram minan naasi biliqaaa'i Rabbihim lakaafiroon
translations.2: Awalam yatafakkaroo fee anfusihim ma khalaqa Allahu alssamawati waalarda wama baynahuma illa bialhaqqi waajalin musamman wainna katheeran mina alnnasi biliqai rabbihim lakafiroona

words.translation: Have not|they traveled|in|the earth|and observed|how|was|(the) end|(of) those|before them|before them|They were|mightier|to them|(in) strength|and they dug|the earth|and built (on) it|more|than what|they have built (on) it|And came (to) them|their Messengers|with clear proofs|So not|was|Allah|to wrong them|but|they were|themselves|(doing) wrong

translations.1: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; kaanooo ashadda minhhum quwwatanw Wa-asaarul arda Wa-'amaroohaaa aksara mimmaa 'amaroohaa Wa-jaaa'athum Rusuluhum bil-baiyyinaati famaa kaanal laahu liyazli-mahum Wa-laakin kaanooo anfusahum yazlimoon
translations.2: Awalam yaseeroo fee alardi fayanthuroo kayfa kana AAaqibatu allatheena min qablihim kanoo ashadda minhum quwwatan waatharoo alarda waAAamarooha akthara mimma AAamarooha wajaathum rusuluhum bialbayyinati fama kana Allahu liyathlimahum walakin kanoo anfusahum yathlimoona

words.translation: Then|was|(the) end|(of) those who|did evil|the evil|because|they denied|(the) Signs|(of) Allah|and were|of them|making mockery

translations.1: Summa kaana 'aaqibatal lazeena asaaa'us sooo-aaa an kazzaboo bi-aayaatil laahi Wa-kaanoo bihaa yastahzi'oon
translations.2: Thumma kana AAaqibata allatheena asaoo alssooa an kaththaboo biayati Allahi wakanoo biha yastahzioona

words.translation: Allah|originates|the creation|then|He repeats it|then|to Him|you will be returned

translations.1: Allaahu yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo summa ilaihi turja'oon
translations.2: Allahu yabdao alkhalqa thumma yuAAeeduhu thumma ilayhi turjaAAoona

words.translation: And (the) Day|will (be) established|the Hour|will (be in) despair|the criminals

translations.1: Wa-yawma taqoomus Saa'atu yublisul mujrimoon
translations.2: Wayawma taqoomu alssaAAatu yublisu almujrimoona

words.translation: And not|will be|for them|among|theirs partners|any intercessors|and they will be|in their partners|disbelievers

translations.1: Wa-lam yakul lahum min shurakaaa'ihim shufa'aaa'u Wa-kaanoo bishurakaaa'ihim kaafireen
translations.2: Walam yakun lahum min shurakaihim shufaAAao wakanoo bishurakaihim kafireena

words.translation: And (the) Day|will (be) established|the Hour|that Day|they will become separated

translations.1: Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu Yawma'izien yatafarraqoon
translations.2: Wayawma taqoomu alssaAAatu yawmaithin yatafarraqoona

words.translation: Then as for|those who|believed|and did|righteous deeds|so they|in|a Garden|will be delighted

translations.1: Fa-ammal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fahum fee rawdatien yuhbaroon
translations.2: Faamma allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati fahum fee rawdatin yuhbaroona

words.translation: But as for|those who|disbelieved|and denied|Our Signs|and (the) meeting|(of) the Hereafter|then those|in|the punishment|(will be) brought forth

translations.1: Wa-ammal lazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-liqaaa'il Aakhirati faulaaa'ika fil 'azaabi muhdaroon
translations.2: Waamma allatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biayatina waliqai alakhirati faolaika fee alAAathabi muhdaroona

words.translation: So glory be to|Allah|when|you reach the evening|and when|you reach the morning

translations.1: Fa-Subhaanal laahi heena tumsoona Wa-heena tusbihoon
translations.2: Fasubhana Allahi heena tumsoona waheena tusbihoona

words.translation: And for Him|(are) all praises|in|the heavens|and the earth|and (at) night|and when|you are at noon

translations.1: Wa-lahul hamdu fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-'ashiyyanw Wa-heena tuzhiroon
translations.2: Walahu alhamdu fee alssamawati waalardi waAAashiyyan waheena tuthhiroona

words.translation: He brings forth|the living|from|the dead|and He brings forth|the dead|from|the living|and He gives life|(to) the earth|after|its death|and thus|you will be brought forth

translations.1: Yukhrijul haiyya minal maiyyiti Wa-yukhrijul maiyyita minal haiyyi Wa-yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; Wa-kazaalika tukhrajoon
translations.2: Yukhriju alhayya mina almayyiti wayukhriju almayyita mina alhayyi wayuhyee alarda baAAda mawtiha wakathalika tukhrajoona

words.translation: And among|His Signs|(is) that|He created you|from|dust|then|behold!|You|(are) human beings|dispersing

translations.1: Wa-min Aayaatiheee an khalaqakum min turaabin summa izaaa antum basharun tantashiroon
translations.2: Wamin ayatihi an khalaqakum min turabin thumma itha antum basharun tantashiroona

words.translation: And among|His Signs|(is) that|He created|for you|from|yourselves|mates|that you may find tranquility|in them|and He placed|between you|love|and mercy|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) Signs|for a people|who reflect

translations.1: Wa-min Aayaatiheee an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwaajal litaskunooo ilaihaa Wa-ja'ala bainakum mawad-datanw Wa-rahmah; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yatafakkaroon
translations.2: Wamin ayatihi an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwajan litaskunoo ilayha wajaAAala baynakum mawaddatan warahmatan inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaroona

words.translation: And among|His Signs|(is the) creation|(of) the heavens|and the earth|and the diversity|(of) your languages|and your colors|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) Signs|for those of knowledge

translations.1: Wa-min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal-aardi wakhtilaafu alsinatikum Wa-alwaanikum; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil lil'aalimeen
translations.2: Wamin ayatihi khalqu alssamawati waalardi waikhtilafu alsinatikum waalwanikum inna fee thalika laayatin lilAAalimeena

words.translation: And among|His Signs|(is) your sleep|by night|and the day|[and] your seeking|of|His Bounty|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) Signs|for a people|who listen

translations.1: Wa-min Aayaatihee manaamukum bil-laili wannahaari wabtighaaa'ukum min fadlih; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yasma'oon
translations.2: Wamin ayatihi manamukum biallayli waalnnahari waibtighaokum min fadlihi inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yasmaAAoona

words.translation: And among|His Signs|He shows you|the lightning|(causing) fear|and hope|and He sends down|from|the sky|water|and gives life|therewith|(to) the earth|after|its death|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) Signs|for a people|who use intellect

translations.1: Wa-min Aayaatihee yureekumul barqa khawfanw Wa-tama'anw Wa-yunazzilu minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-yuhyee bihil arda ba'da mawtihaaa inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien ya'qiloon
translations.2: Wamin ayatihi yureekumu albarqa khawfan watamaAAan wayunazzilu mina alssamai maan fayuhyee bihi alarda baAAda mawtiha inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yaAAqiloona

words.translation: And among|His Signs|(is) that|stands|the heavens|and the earth|by His Command|Then|when|He calls you|(with) a call|from|the earth|behold!|You|will come forth

translations.1: Wa-min Aayaatihee an taqoomas samaaa'u wal-ardu bi-amrih; summa izaa da'aakum da'watam minal ardi izaaa antum takhrujoon
translations.2: Wamin ayatihi an taqooma alssamao waalardu biamrihi thumma itha daAAakum daAAwatan mina alardi itha antum takhrujoona

words.translation: And to Him (belongs)|whoever|(is) in|the heavens|and the earth|All|to Him|(are) obedient

translations.1: Wa-lahoo man fis samaawaati wal-ardi kullul lahoo qaanitoon
translations.2: Walahu man fee alssamawati waalardi kullun lahu qanitoona

words.translation: And He|(is) the One Who|originates|the creation|then|repeats it|and it|(is) easier|for Him|And for Him|(is) the description|the highest|in|the heavens|and the earth|And He|(is) the All-Mighty|the All-Wise

translations.1: Wa-Huwal lazee yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo Wa-huwa ahwanu 'alaih; Wa-lahul masalul la'laa fis samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
translations.2: Wahuwa allathee yabdao alkhalqa thumma yuAAeeduhu wahuwa ahwanu AAalayhi walahu almathalu alaAAla fee alssamawati waalardi wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu

words.translation: He sets forth|to you|an example|from|yourselves|Is|for you|among|what|posses|your right hands|any|partners|in|what|We have provided you|so you|in it|(are) equal|you fear them|as you fear|yourselves|Thus|We explain|the Verses|for a people|(who) use reason

translations.1: Daraba lakum masalam min anfusikum hal lakum mimmaa malakat aymaanukum min shurakaaa'a fee maa razaqnaakum fa-antum feehi sawaaa'un takhaafoonahum kakheefa tikum anfusakum; kazaalika nufassilul Aayaati liqawminy ya'qiloon
translations.2: Daraba lakum mathalan min anfusikum hal lakum mi mma malakat aymanukum min shurakaa fee ma razaqnakum faantum feehi sawaon takhafoonahum kakheefatikum anfusakum kathalika nufassilu alayati liqawmin yaAAqiloona

words.translation: Nay|follow|those who|do wrong|their desires|without|knowledge|Then who|(can) guide|(one) whom|Allah has let go astray|Allah has let go astray|And not|for them|any|helpers

translations.1: Balit taba'al lazeena zalamooo ahwaaa'ahum bighairi 'ilmin famai yahdee man adallal laahu Wa-maa lahum min naasireen
translations.2: Bali ittabaAAa allatheena thalamoo ahwaahum bighayri AAilmin faman yahdee man adalla Allahu wama lahum min nasireena

words.translation: So set|your face|to the religion|upright|Nature|(made by) Allah|(upon) which|He has created|mankind|[on it]|No|change|(should there be) in the creation|(of) Allah|That|(is) the religion|the correct|but|most|men|(do) not|know

translations.1: Fa-aqim wajhaka liddeeni Haneefaa; fitratal laahil latee fataran naasa 'alaihaa; laa taabdeela likhalqil laah; zaalikad deenul qaiyimu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon
translations.2: Faaqim wajhaka lilddeeni haneefan fitrata Allahi allatee fatara alnnasa AAalayha la tabdeela likhalqi Allahi thalika alddeenu alqayyimu walakinna akthara alnnasi la yaAAlamoona

words.translation: Turning|to Him|and fear Him|and establish|the prayer|and (do) not|be|of|the polytheists

translations.1: Muneebeena ilaihi wattaqoohu Wa-aqeemus Salaata Wa-laa takoonoo minal mushrikeen
translations.2: Muneebeena ilayhi waittaqoohu waaqeemoo alssalata wala takoonoo mina almushrikeena

words.translation: Of|those who|divide|their religion|and become|sects|each|party|in what|they have|rejoicing

translations.1: Minal lazeena farraqoo deenahum Wa-kaanoo shiya'an kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim farihoon
translations.2: Mina allatheena farraqoo deenahum wakanoo shiyaAAan kullu hizbin bima ladayhim farihoona

words.translation: And when|touches|men|hardship|they call|their Lord|turning|to Him|Then|when|He causes them to taste|from Him|Mercy|behold!|A party|of them|with their Lord|associate partners

translations.1: Wa-izaa massan naasa durrun da'aw Rabbahum muneebeena ilaihi summa izaaa azaqahum minhu rahmatan izaa fareequm minhum bi-Rabbihim yushrikoon
translations.2: Waitha massa alnnasa durrun daAAaw rabbahum muneebeena ilayhi thumma itha athaqahum minhu rahmatan itha fareequn minhum birabbihim yushrikoona

words.translation: So as to deny|[in] what|We have granted them|Then enjoy|but soon|you will know

translations.1: Li-yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum; fatamatta'oo fasawfa ta'lamoon
translations.2: Liyakfuroo bima ataynahum fatamattaAAoo fasawfa taAAlamoona

words.translation: Or|have We sent|to them|an authority|and it|speaks|of what|they were|with Him|associating

translations.1: Am anzalnaa 'alaihim sultaanan fahuwa yatakallamu bimaa kaanoo bihee yushrikoon
translations.2: Am anzalna AAalayhim sultanan fahuwa yatakallamu bima kanoo bihi yushrikoona

words.translation: And when|We cause men to taste|We cause men to taste|mercy|they rejoice|therein|But if|afflicts them|an evil|for what|have sent forth|their hands|behold|They|despair

translations.1: Wa-izaaa azaqnan naasa rahmatan farihoo bihaa Wa-in tusibhum sayyi'atum bimaa qaddamat aydeehim izaa hum yaqnatoon
translations.2: Waitha athaqna alnnasa rahmatan farihoo biha wain tusibhum sayyiatun bima qaddamat aydeehim itha hum yaqnatoona

words.translation: Do not|they see|that|Allah|extends|the provision|for whom|He wills|and straitens (it)|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) Signs|for a people|who believe

translations.1: Awalam yaraw annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yu'minoon
translations.2: Awalam yaraw anna Allaha yabsutu alrrizqa liman yashao wayaqdiru inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yuminoona

words.translation: So give|the relative|the relative|his right|and the poor|and the wayfarer|and the wayfarer|That|(is) best|for those who|desire|(the) Countenance|(of) Allah|And those|they|(are) the successful ones

translations.1: Fa-aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnassabeel; zaalika khairul lil lazeena yureedoona Wajhal laahi Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
translations.2: Faati tha alqurba haqqahu waalmiskeena waibna alssabeeli thalika khayrun lillatheena yureedoona wajha Allahi waolaika humu almuflihoona

words.translation: And what|you give|for|usury|to increase|in|(the) wealth|(of) people|not|(will) increase|with|Allah|But what|you give|of|zakah|desiring|(the) Countenance|(of) Allah|then those|[they]|(will) get manifold

translations.1: Wa-maaa aataitum mir ribal li-yarbuwa feee amwaalin naasi falaa yarboo 'indal laahi Wa-maaa aataitum min zaakaatin tureedoona wajhal laahi fa-ulaaa'ika humul mud'ifoon
translations.2: Wama ataytum min riban liyarbuwa fee amwali alnnasi fala yarboo AAinda Allahi wama ataytum min zakatin tureedoona wajha Allahi faolaika humu almudAAifoona

words.translation: Allah|(is) the One Who|created you|then|He provided (for) you|then|He will cause you to die|then|He will give you life|Is (there)|any|(of) your partners|who|does|of|that|any|thing|Glory be to Him|and exalted is He|above what|they associate

translations.1: Allaahul lazee khalaqa-kum summa razaqakum summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum hal min shurakaaa'ikum maien yaf'alu min zaalikum min shai'; Sub-haanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon
translations.2: Allahu allathee khalaqakum thumma razaqakum thumma yumeetukum thumma yuhyeekum hal min shurakaikum man yafAAalu min thalikum min shayin subhanahu wataAAala AAamma yushrikoona

words.translation: Has appeared|the corruption|in|the land|and the sea|for what|have earned|(the) hands|(of) people|so that He may let them taste|a part|(of) that which|they have done|so that they may|return

translations.1: Zaharal fasaadu fil barri wal-bahri bimaa kasabat aydin naasi li-yuzeeqahum ba'dal lazee 'amiloo la'allahum yarji'oon
translations.2: Thahara alfasadu fee albarri waalbahri bima kasabat aydee alnnasi liyutheeqahum baAAda allathee AAamiloo laAAallahum yarjiAAoona

words.translation: Say|Travel|in|the earth|and see|how|was|(the) end|(of) those who|(were) before|(were) before|Most of them were|Most of them were|polytheists

translations.1: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qabl; kaana aksaruhum mushrikeen
translations.2: Qul seeroo fee alardi faonthuroo kayfa kana AAaqibatu allatheena min qablu kana aktharuhum mushrikeena

words.translation: So set|your face|to the religion|right|before|before|[that]|comes|a Day|not|(can be) averted|[it]|from|Allah|That Day|they will be divided

translations.1: Fa-aqim wajhaka lid-deenil qaiyyimi min qabli aien yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo minal laahi Yawma'izien yassadda'oon
translations.2: Faaqim wajhaka lilddeeni alqayyimi min qabli an yatiya yawmun la maradda lahu mina Allahi yawmaithin yassaddaAAoona

words.translation: Whoever|disbelieves|then against him|(is) his disbelief|And whoever|does|righteousness|then for themselves|they are preparing

translations.1: Man kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo Wa-man 'amila saalihan fali-anfusihim yamhadoon
translations.2: Man kafara faAAalayhi kufruhu waman AAamila salihan falianfusihim yamhadoona

words.translation: That He may reward|those who|believe|and do|righteous deeds|(out) of|His Bounty|Indeed He|(does) not|like|the disbelievers

translations.1: Li-yajziyal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati min fadlih; innahoo laa yuhibbul kaafireen
translations.2: Liyajziya allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati min fadlihi innahu la yuhibbu alkafireena

words.translation: And among|His Signs|(is) that|He sends|the winds|(as) bearers of glad tidings|and to let you taste|of|His Mercy|and that may sail|the ships|at His Command|and that you may seek|of|His Bounty|and that you may|be grateful

translations.1: Wa-min Aayaatiheee aien yursilar riyaaha mubashshi-raatinw Wa-li-yuzeeqakum mir rahmatihee Wa-litajriyal fulku bi-amrihee Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon
translations.2: Wamin ayatihi an yursila alrriyaha mubashshiratin waliyutheeqakum min rahmatihi walitajriya alfulku biamrihi walitabtaghoo min fadlihi walaAAallakum tashkuroona

words.translation: And verily|We sent|before you|before you|Messengers|to|their people|and they came to them|with clear proofs|then We took retribution|from|those who|committed crimes|And it was|incumbent|upon Us|(to) help|the believers

translations.1: Wa-laqad arsalnaa min qablika Rusulan ilaa qawmihim fajaaa'oohum bil-baiyyinaati fantaqamnaa minal lazeena ajramoo Wa-kaana haqqan 'alainaa nasrul mu'mineen
translations.2: Walaqad arsalna min qablika rusulan ila qawmihim fajaoohum bialbayyinati faintaqamna mina allatheena ajramoo wakana haqqan AAalayna nasru almumineena

words.translation: Allah|(is) the One Who|sends|the winds|so they raise|(the) clouds|then He spreads them|in|the sky|how|He wills|and He makes them|fragments|so you see|the rain|coming forth|from|their midst|Then when|He causes it to fall on|He causes it to fall on|whom|He wills|of|His slaves|behold|They|rejoice

translations.1: Allaahul lazee yursilur riyaaha fatuseeru sahaaban fa-yabsutuhoo fis samaaa'i kaifa yashaaa'u Wa-yaj'aluhoo kisafan fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilaalihee fa-izaaa asaaba bihee mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee izaa hum yastabshiroon
translations.2: Allahu allathee yursilu alrriyaha fatutheeru sahaban fayabsutuhu fee alssamai kayfa yashao wayajAAaluhu kisafan fatara alwadqa yakhruju min khilalihi faitha asaba bihi man yashao min AAibadihi itha hum yastabshiroona

words.translation: And certainly|they were|before|before|[that]|it was sent down|upon them|[before it]|[before it]|surely in despair

translations.1: Wa-in kaanoo min qabli aien yunazzala 'alaihim min qablihee lamubliseen
translations.2: Wain kanoo min qabli an yunazzala AAalayhim min qablihi lamubliseena

words.translation: So look|at|(the) effects|(of the) Mercy|(of) Allah|how|He gives life|(to) the earth|after|its death|Indeed|that|surely He (will) give life|(to) the dead|And He|(is) on|every|thing|All-Powerful

translations.1: Fanzur ilaaa aasaari rahmatil laahi kaifa yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; inna zaalika lamuhyil mawtaa Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
translations.2: Faonthur ila athari rahmati Allahi kayfa yuhyee alarda baAAda mawtiha inna thalika lamuhyee almawta wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeerun

words.translation: But if|We sent|a wind|and they see it|turn yellow|certainly they continue|after it|after it|(in) disbelief

translations.1: Wa-la'in arsalnaa reehan fara-awhu musfarral lazalloo mim ba'dihee yakfuroon
translations.2: Walain arsalna reehan faraawhu musfarran lathalloo min baAAdihi yakfuroona

words.translation: So indeed, you|(can) not|make the dead hear|make the dead hear|and not|make the deaf hear|make the deaf hear|the call|when|they turn|retreating

translations.1: Fa-innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa Wa-laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa'a izaa wallaw mudbireen
translations.2: Fainnaka la tusmiAAu almawta wala tusmiAAu alssumma aldduAAaa itha wallaw mudbireena

words.translation: And not|you|can guide|the blind|from|their error|Not|you can make hear|except|(those) who|believe|in Our Verses|so they|surrender

translations.1: Wa-maa anta bihaadil 'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa maien yuminu bi-aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon
translations.2: Wama anta bihadi alAAumyi AAan dalalatihim in tusmiAAu illa man yuminu biayatina fahum muslimoona

words.translation: Allah|(is) the One Who|created you|from|weakness|then|made|after|after|weakness|strength|then|made|after|after|strength|weakness|and gray hair|He creates|what|He wills|and He|(is) the All-Knower|the All-Powerful

translations.1: Allahul lazee khalaqa-kum min du'fin summa ja'ala mim ba'di du'fin quwwatan summa ja'ala mim ba'di quwwatin du'fanw Wa-shaibah; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal 'Aleemul Qadeer
translations.2: Allahu allathee khalaqakum min daAAfin thumma jaAAala min baAAdi daAAfin quwwatan thumma jaAAala min baAAdi quwwatin daAAfan washaybatan yakhluqu ma yashao wahuwa alAAaleemu alqadeeru

words.translation: And (the) Day|will (be) established|the Hour|will swear|the criminals|not|they remained|but|an hour|Thus|they were|deluded

translations.1: Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu yuqsimul mujrimoona maa labisoo ghaira saa'ah; kazaalika kaanoo yu'fakoon
translations.2: Wayawma taqoomu alssaAAatu yuqsimu almujrimoona ma labithoo ghayra saAAatin kathalika kanoo yufakoona

words.translation: But will say|those who|were given|the knowledge|and the faith|Verily|you remained|by|(the) Decree|(of) Allah|until|(the) Day|(of) Resurrection|And this|(is the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|but you|were|not|knowing

translations.1: Wa-qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wal-eemaana laqad labistum fee kitaabil laahi ilaa yawmil ba'si fahaazaa yawmul ba'si Wa-laakinnakum kuntum laa ta'lamoon
translations.2: Waqala allatheena ootoo alAAilma waaleemana laqad labithtum fee kitabi Allahi ila yawmi albaAAthi fahatha yawmu albaAAthi walakinnakum kuntum la taAAlamoona

words.translation: So that Day|not|will profit|those who|wronged|their excuses|and not|they|will be allowed to make amends

translations.1: Fa-Yawma'izil laa yanfa'ul lazeena zalamoo ma'ziratu-hum Wa-laa hum yusta'taboon
translations.2: Fayawmaithin la yanfaAAu allatheena thalamoo maAAthiratuhum wala hum yustaAAtaboona

words.translation: And verily|We (have) set forth|for mankind|in|this|[the] Quran|of|every|example|But if|you bring them|a sign|surely will say|those who|disbelieve|Not|you|(are) except|falsifiers

translations.1: Wa-laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Quraani min kulli masal; Wa-la'in ji'tahum bi-aayatil la-yaqoolannal lazeena kafaroo in antum illaa mubtiloon
translations.2: Walaqad darabna lilnnasi fee hatha alqurani min kulli mathalin walain jitahum biayatin layaqoolanna allatheena kafaroo in antum illa mubtiloona

words.translation: Thus|Allah seals|Allah seals|[on]|(the) hearts|(of) those who|(do) not|know

translations.1: Kazaalika yatba'ul laahu 'alaa quloobil lazeena laa ya'lamoon
translations.2: Kathalika yatbaAAu Allahu AAala quloobi allatheena la yaAAlamoona

words.translation: So be patient|Indeed|(the) Promise|(of) Allah|(is) true|And (let) not|take you in light estimation|those who|(are) not|certain in faith

translations.1: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-laa yastakhif-fannakal lazeena laa yooqinoon
translations.2: Faisbir inna waAAda Allahi haqqun wala yastakhiffannaka allatheena la yooqinoona
